page.title: 04Invermoriston School
page.content: Our school is very small with only nine pupils and one teacher.Most of us come to school in a taxi because we live a long way away.We start school at 9.30 and finish at four. Once a fortnight we have Mrs.Macdonald for art lessons and sometimes we have Miss Thomson for fabric work.Inthe summer we go orienteering.We get a map and we have to run and find the points marked on a master map.We also have visits from Mr Buell and Mr.Allen. They are ministers and tell us all about the Bible and Jesus and God. At Christmas we do a Nativity play for our parents and friends and in the summer we have a sports day and a prizegiving when we do another little play and sing songs.Sometimes we can go to swimming lessons in Inverness.
